title: Sample Video Diffusion
shortDescription: Fallback entry providing sample fal.ai release metadata when the live API is unavailable.
description: Generates short looping video clips from text prompts using a distilled diffusion architecture.

title: Sample Audio Vocoder
shortDescription: Fallback sample describing an audio-focused fal.ai deployment.
description: Produces high-fidelity speech from phoneme sequences using a lightweight neural vocoder.
